sect1.title: OpenLink BPEL Process Manager Partner Link properties
sect1.para: This page shows information about the properties of a Partner Link for a BPEL process.

sect3.title: Version
sect3.para: Specify value from the list to be save for the WS-Addressing version section.

sect3.title: Input
sect3.para: Specify value from the list to be save for the Delivery Execution Input section.

sect3.title: Output
sect3.para: Specify value from the list to be save for the Delivery Execution Output section.

sect3.title: User Name
sect3.para: Specify user name for HTTP / HTTPS Authentication.

sect3.title: Password
sect3.para: Specify paswword for HTTP / HTTPS Authentication.

sect3.title: Key
sect3.para: Specify value from "Select" to be save for the WS-Security Key section.

sect3.title: Partner Public key
sect3.para: Specify value from "Select" to be save for the WS-Security Partner Public key section.

sect3.title: Input
sect3.para: If this checkbox is checked, will be shown the lists for the WS-Security Input Encryption and the WS-Security Input Signature.

sect3.title: Encryption
sect3.para: Specify value from the list to be save for the WS-Security Input Encryption section.

sect3.title: Signature
sect3.para: Specify value from the list to be save for the WS-Security Input Signature section.

sect3.title: Out
sect3.para: If this checkbox is checked, will be shown the lists for the WS-Security Out Encryption, the WS-Security Out Signature and the WS-Security Out Function for Custom signature.

sect3.title: Encryption
sect3.para: Specify value from the list to be save for the WS-Security Out Encryption section.

sect3.title: Signature
sect3.para: Specify value from the list to be save for the WS-Security Out Signature section.

sect3.title: Function for Custom signature
sect3.para: Specify name of the function to be used for Custom signature for the WS-Security Out section.
